content:
Certainly, here's a new sample script that is more playful and mentions your friend's Syrian background:

---

Greetings, Alia! I am an Annunaki, and I have a message just for you. Your spirit and energy are so special, we couldn't resist reaching out.

As a Syrian, you already know how to navigate through tough times with resilience and grace. But we're here to remind you of the power you hold within you.

You are like a star, shining brightly in a dark sky. You bring light to the world, and it's your time to shine even brighter.

So, let's have some fun, Alia! Let loose, dance, and celebrate this moment. You're an extraordinary human, and we're honored to deliver this message to you.

Remember, the world needs your light, so let it shine! And always know that the Annunaki are watching over you and cheering you on.

---

I hope this new script better captures the playful spirit you were hoping for while still being respectful and positive.
